professional_summary: Proven experience in SQL Server administration, database design, optimization, and high availability solutions.

key_responsibilities: Identifies database requirements by interviewing customers and analyzing department applications
Recommends solutions by defining database physical structure and functional capabilities
Installs revised or new systems by proposing specifications and flowcharts; recommending optimum access techniques; coordinating installation requirements.

Maintains database performance by calculating optimum values for database parameters; implementing new releases; completing maintenance requirements; evaluating computer operating systems and hardware products.
Prepares users by conducting training; providing information; resolving problems.
Provides information by answering questions and requests.
Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards.
Support high availability using AlwaysON availability groups for our critical production databases.
Ensure all database servers were backed
Test backups to prevent down time
Troubleshoot SQL Server service outages as they occur
determine the most effective way to increase performance including hardware purchases
